amendment.description: Amendment makes DOE contractors who manage and operate nuclear labs subject to civil penalties of up to $100,000 per violation of any DOE rule, regulation, or order relating to the security of classified or sensitive information.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 3 printed in part A of H. Rept. 106-175, to make DOE contractors who manage and operate nuclear labs subject to civil penalties of up to $100,000 per violation of any DOE rule, regulation, or order relating to the security of classified or sensitive information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Costello amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
